metadata.title: CVE-2020-36420 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Polipo through 1.1.1, when NDEBUG isomitted, allows denial of service via a reachable assertion during parsingof a malformed Range header. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects productsthat are no longer supported by the maintainer.

criterions.comment: polipo package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
